Room.Name: A beaten path
Room.Description: This small path is nearly completely hidden from view due to the valley far above. This trail leads down to a smaller, narrow path. A broken, small wooden sign is stuck in the ground. Looking back you find the trail gone!

ExtraDescription.Description: Welcome to the Hobo Train Yard! Beware, Hobo's await you!

Room.Name: A narrow road
Room.Description: This narrow road leads north to the old trail tracks. The roadside is lined with medium sized rocks and flowers to give it a welcoming look. To the sides of the road you notice old boxes and beer bottles, along with many signs of hobo life.

Room.Name: A narrow road
Room.Description: This narrow road leads north to the old trail tracks. The roadside is lined with medium sized rocks and flowers to give it a welcoming look. To the sides of the road you notice old boxes and beer bottles, along with many signs of hobo life.

Room.Name: A narrow road
Room.Description: This narrow road leads north to the old trail tracks. The roadside is lined with medium sized rocks and flowers to give it a welcoming look. To the sides of the road you notice old boxes and beer bottles, along with many signs of hobo life.

Room.Name: Beside an iron gate
Room.Description: The small road widens here before an iron fence. North is a massive ion gate with an automatic lock. The gates lock is however, not locked. To the west is a small shack for the watchman to sit on his ass and keep out the riff raff. The road continues to the north.

Room.Name: The watchman's shack
Room.Description: This small wooden shack is here to keep the watchman comfortable while keeping watch over the old train tracks. On the southern wall is a small portable TV, along with a variety of muchies and drinks. On the eastern wall is the door, which you came through. To the west and north is a counter piled high with papers. A cracked light bulb flickers and buzzes from the ceiling.

Room.Name: A small sidewalk
Room.Description: This small concrete sidewalk leads east west along with train tracks. The sidewalk is lit by a series of old rusty streetlights. The shadows of the old train cars leaves an eerie feeling all around you. You can here voices and grumbles from the hobo's living inside the train cars.

Room.Name: A small sidewalk
Room.Description: This small concrete sidewalk leads east west along with train tracks. The sidewalk is lit by a series of old rusty streetlights. The shadows of the old train cars leaves an eerie feeling all around you. You can here voices and grumbles from the hobo's living inside the train cars.

Room.Description: This small concrete sidewalk leads east west along with train tracks. The sidewalk is lit by a series of old rusty streetlights. The shadows of the old train cars leaves an eerie feeling all around you. You can here voices and grumbles from the hobo's living inside the train cars.

Room.Name: A small sidewalk
Room.Description: This small concrete sidewalk leads east west along with train tracks. The sidewalk is lit by a series of old rusty streetlights. The shadows of the old train cars leaves an eerie feeling all around you. You can here voices and grumbles from the hobo's living inside the train cars.

Room.Name: A small sidewalk
Room.Description: This small concrete sidewalk leads east west along with train tracks. The sidewalk is lit by a series of old rusty streetlights. The shadows of the old train cars leaves an eerie feeling all around you. You can here voices and grumbles from the hobo's living inside the train cars.

Room.Name: A boxcar
Room.Description: A family of white trash, low-income hoboes, occupies this old, wooden boxcar. A small fire lights and heats the area. A small woman and child are huddled near the fire. A large, gray-bearded wife beater is snarling towards the corner of the boxcar. The northern exit opposite the door you entered is nailed shut.

Room.Name: A boxcar
Room.Description: This old, rotting boxcar is empty for even the lowest, poorest, cheapest hobo in all of Orthos would not take the shame of living here. The only remains are a few scraps of paper and rusted bolts. The old wooden door to the north is closed.

Room.Name: A platform
Room.Description: This steel platform was once used for transporting logs and pipes, although now it's only purpose is a boxing arena. Large wooden pegs hold the police tape around the platform making a fighting ring. Near the sides are broken bottles and iron pipes used as weapons. When two hobo's get into a fight, it is resolved here.

Room.Name: An oil tanker
Room.Description: This dark, smelly tanker is inches deep in dark, cold water. The hole above is the only source of light. Although this place really is a shit-hole the two children swimming in the piss-infected water seems as happy as if they where swimming in the ocean.

Room.Name: A boxcar
Room.Description: This boxcar looks to be the best of them all. Not a single cracked board or broken window. Yes, this boxcar is the Beverly Hills of trailer trash heaven. A group of pretty fucked up looking people occupy the area. A large lantern and bug-zapper light the entire area. A large hole opens north.

Room.Name: The caboose
Room.Description: You find yourself in the caboose of the old, hobo train. This car is empty and seems to be used as storage for all of the hobo's. The entire room is filled with boxes and crates, of course, none of them less than 20 years old. The old door to the north is open.

Room.Name: A platform
Room.Description: This platform is smaller than the others on the train. The unstable wooden floor gives you an unsafe feeling. The platform is clear except for a collection of the worlds biggest hicks and hobo's.

Room.Name: A boxcar
Room.Description: Whoever occupies this boxcar has made a sad attempt to lock it using an old master lock with no dial that simply pops right open. The floor is dry and cracked, the walls warped and the paint scratched off. Towards the eastern end of the boxcar is an old man shivering back and fourth. A small open door exits north.

Room.Name: A collapsed boxcar
Room.Description: You stand within the ruins of an aged boxcar. The piles of broken wood and maimed iron look ages old. This wreck is not occupied by anyone except the small children crawling upon it.

Room.Name: The passenger car
Room.Description: This once well-decorated car now lies in ruins. The lights all broken and walls torn and warped. The window are shattered and glass is all over the floor. There is no exit to the north.

Room.Name: The engine room
Room.Description: This small car is cluttered with controls, levers, and ropes. The small light still flickers from above. Despite the fact that the controls look un-touched it is doubtful the train would ever move. Right at the front of the train is a rope marked "Horn". A small door and ladders leads out both north and south.

Room.Name: A small sidewalk
Room.Description: This small concrete sidewalk leads east west along with train tracks. The sidewalk is lit by a series of old rusty streetlights. The shadows of the old train cars leaves an eerie feeling all around you. You can here voices and grumbles from the hobo's living inside the train cars.

Room.Name: A small sidewalk
Room.Description: This small concrete sidewalk leads east west along with train tracks. The sidewalk is lit by a series of old rusty streetlights. The shadows of the old train cars leaves an eerie feeling all around you. You can here voices and grumbles from the hobo's living inside the train cars.

Room.Name: A small sidewalk
Room.Description: This small concrete sidewalk leads east west along with train tracks. The sidewalk is lit by a series of old rusty streetlights. The shadows of the old train cars leaves an eerie feeling all around you. You can here voices and grumbles from the hobo's living inside the train cars.

NPC.name: watchman
NPC.description: This stinky old bastard sits on his ass all day for not a cent more than minimum wage. His dark brown hair looks as if it hasn't been washed since his he last brushed what's left of his teeth, which was 8 years ago.
NPC.longDescription: The Watchman is sleeping on his old, green cot.

NPC.name: hobo child
NPC.description: This small girl is dressed in rags, her tiny tits nearly showing. Her blue eyes are faded and bloodshot. Her blond hair is roughly cut and crusted with dirt.
NPC.longDescription: A small child huddles next to the fire, ashamed at her hobo life.

NPC.name: sad woman
NPC.description: This woman looks like pure shit. She has obviously not eaten in days, nor has she bathed in months. Her frizzy hair is a tangled mess. She is here comforting her daughter trying to survive.
NPC.longDescription: A sad woman is here hugging her daughter.

NPC.name: bearbed man wife beater
NPC.description: This crazed looking wife beater stands towards the back of the boxcar, ashamed to look at his family. He holds a twisted, demented golf club in his hands.
NPC.longDescription: An old bearbed wife beater stands towards the back of the boxcar.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden ProtectionEvil ProtectionGood Haste DetectIllusion

NPC.name: racoon
NPC.description: It's fuzzy, soft, and would gladly eat even your balls for a decent meal.
NPC.longDescription: A small racoon is hiding here, looking for tonights meal.

NPC.name: small child boy
NPC.description: This small boy is soaking wet in dirty, smelly water. His dark black hair is unwashed, despite the piss-dirty water he's swimming in.
NPC.longDescription: A small boy is here flopping around in the muddy water.

NPC.name: hobo
NPC.longDescription: A dirty hobo walks the sidewalk, begging all the other hobo's for food.

NPC.name: hobo paul
NPC.description: This sad excuse for a human being stands here rolling a joint. His glasses are cracked and his fingernails are embedded with dirt.
NPC.longDescription: Here stands a hobo wearing blue overalls, his name tage says "Paul".

NPC.name: begger
NPC.description: This man has a truly sad, pathetic look on his face. Although me may have no valuable skill in the world, he is a damn good begger.
NPC.longDescription: A pale-faced begger is here rattling a tin cup.

NPC.name: old man
NPC.description: This old, nasty man rocks back and fourth in denial over his pathetic life.
NPC.longDescription: An old man shivers back and forth, mutters to himself.

NPC.name: dwarf conductor
NPC.description: This old dwarf is dressed in white overalls, a black conductors hat and a silver pocket watch.
NPC.longDescription: A grumpy dwarf stands here, by his clothing you can tell he is the conductor.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared ProtectionEvil ProtectionGood Haste

NPC.name: bob strangler
NPC.description: This old man has white hair and dark skin. He wears a plain white shirt and dark blue jeans. He is smoking a cigerette and snarls. As you approuch he says "I'll break your arm!"
NPC.longDescription: Bob, the silent strangler crouches here awaiting his next victim.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary ProtectionEvil ProtectionGood Hide PassDoor Haste DarkVision DetectIllusion

Item.Name: nightstick
Item.LongDescription: A black, iron nightstick lies here.

Item.Name: twisted golf club
Item.LongDescription: A demented, twisted golf club lies at your feet.

Item.Name: switchblade
Item.LongDescription: A switchblade lies here, glinting in the dirt.

Item.Name: black cap
Item.LongDescription: The black conductors cap lies here.

Item.Name: white overalls
Item.LongDescription: A pair of white overalls lay before you.

Item.Name: pocket watch pocketwatch
Item.LongDescription: A silver pocket watch lies here, connected to a silver chain.

Item.Name: extension cord
Item.LongDescription: A freezing extension cord lies before you, on the handle it reads "Bob, the Strangler".
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum Evil NoRemove VisDeath NoUncurse Flaming Frost Vorpal TwoHands Shocking Poison Unholy
